name: Aqua Realm
description:
My submission to the BenBonk Game Jam 2022 with the limitation  "Use a maximum of four colours for your game"

Dropped into the Aqua Realm with only your bow and 10 arrows you must escape without dying to the slimes that inhabit the area. Upon escaping, your total time and number of kills are displayed. There are a total of 120 slimes in the Realm, divided into 80 light slimes and 40 dark slimes.

If a fired arrow hits a wall then it will stick, and must be recollected. However if an arrow hits an slime, it becomes available immediately. You start off with 10 hearts and walking into a slime will make you lose one. After taking damage, or walking between screens, you get a brief period of invincibility.

CONTROLS:
  • WASD - Movement in the menus and game.
  • SPACE - Selection in the menus, fire an arrow in-game.
ASSETS USED:
  • Kenney Font Package - Kenney
